titles.title: A bill to amend the Lanham Act to limit the defense against trademark infringement relating to geographic origin.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 9/15/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal trademark law to limit the defense against trademark infringement relating to geographic origin to a defense on the ground that the allegedly infringing use is of a name, term, or device fairly used only to describe a country of origin.
